---
title: "Preparing ACS file"
output: html_document
---

```{r load, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(stringr)
```

```{r read_csv}
median = read_csv("./ACS_data/ACS_2019_Median_Household_Income.csv") %>%
  filter(str_detect(GEONAME, "County")) %>%
  rename("county" = "GEONAME") %>%
  rename("median_hhold_inc" = "ESTIMATE") %>%
  select(county, median_hhold_inc)
```
